titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the consideration of a bill or joint resolution, or any amendment thereto or conference report thereon, that includes reconciliation legislation prior to the receipt by the committee of jurisdiction of the cost analysis for such legislation from the Congressional Budget Office.

Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the consideration of a bill or joint resolution, or any amendment thereto or conference report thereon, that includes reconciliation legislation prior to the receipt by the committee of jurisdiction of the cost analysis for such legislation from the Congressional Budget Office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: This resolution prohibits consideration of a bill or joint resolution, or a related amendment or conference report, that includes reconciliation language prior to the committee of jurisdiction receiving the cost analysis for that legislation from the Congressional Budget Office.
